title: Hero MotoCorp receives over 25,000 bookings for India-made Harley-Davidson
description: Hero MotoCorp said 65% of the bookings for the X440 were for the motorcycle's top-end variant, priced at 269,000 rupees. Hero, the world's largest motorcycle maker by sales, said in a statement it will begin production of the X440 in September and begin deliveries from October.
